trans-unit.source: Exercise – Create a Machine Type

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Create a Machine Type

trans-unit.source: A MIG Welder is a new item that will be available for sale. It must set up as a Machine Type and purchased before it can be sold to customers. The unit cost is 4500, the unit price is 5900, and it must be set up for serial number tracking.

seg-source.mrk: A MIG Welder is a new item that will be available for sale.
It must set up as a Machine Type and purchased before it can be sold to customers.
The unit cost is 4500, the unit price is 5900, and it must be set up for serial number tracking.

trans-unit.source: A new vendor, Weller Electric Manufacturing Co., must be set up for the purchase of this item.

seg-source.mrk: A new vendor, Weller Electric Manufacturing Co., must be set up for the purchase of this item.

trans-unit.source: Create a Machine Type Item

seg-source.mrk: Create a Machine Type Item

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create a Machine Type:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create a Machine Type:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Departments > Machines > Types > Machine Types.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Departments > Machines > Types > Machine Types.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, type R-50000-01.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field, type R-50000-01.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the Base Unit of Measure field is filled automatically.

seg-source.mrk: Notice that the Base Unit of Measure field is filled automatically.

trans-unit.source: In the Description field, type MIG Welder.

seg-source.mrk: In the Description field, type MIG Welder.

trans-unit.source: : Machine Type Card page

seg-source.mrk: : Machine Type Card page

trans-unit.source: Expand the Invoicing FastTab and notice that the Costing Method field is set to Specific.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Invoicing FastTab and notice that the Costing Method field is set to Specific.

trans-unit.source: In the Unit Cost field, enter 4,500.

seg-source.mrk: In the Unit Cost field, enter 4,500.

trans-unit.source: In the Unit Price field, enter 5,900.

seg-source.mrk: In the Unit Price field, enter 5,900.

trans-unit.source: In the Gen. Prod. Posting Group field, enter RETAIL.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Gen.
Prod.
Posting Group field, enter RETAIL.

trans-unit.source: In the Inventory Posting Group field, enter RESALE.

seg-source.mrk: In the Inventory Posting Group field, enter RESALE.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Item Tracking FastTab and notice that the Item Tracking Code field is set to SNALL.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Item Tracking FastTab and notice that the Item Tracking Code field is set to SNALL.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close Machine Type Card page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close Machine Type Card page.

trans-unit.source: Set Up a Vendor and Process a Purchase Order

seg-source.mrk: Set Up a Vendor and Process a Purchase Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to set up a vendor and process a Purchase Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to set up a vendor and process a Purchase Order:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Purchasing > Order Processing > Vendors.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Purchasing > Order Processing > Vendors.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New.

trans-unit.source: Click Cancel to close the templates page.

seg-source.mrk: Click Cancel to close the templates page.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, type R-50000.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field, type R-50000.

trans-unit.source: In the Name field, type Weller Electric Manufacturing Co.

seg-source.mrk: In the Name field, type Weller Electric Manufacturing Co.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Address & Contact FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Address & Contact FastTab.

trans-unit.source: In the Post Code field, enter GL78 5TT.

seg-source.mrk: In the Post Code field, enter GL78 5TT.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Invoicing FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Invoicing FastTab.

trans-unit.source: In the Gen. Bus. Posting Group field, enter EU.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Gen.
Bus.
Posting Group field, enter EU.

trans-unit.source: In the Vendor Posting Group field, enter EU.

seg-source.mrk: In the Vendor Posting Group field, enter EU.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Purchase Order to create a new purchase order for this vendor.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Purchase Order to create a new purchase order for this vendor.

trans-unit.source: In the Vendor Invoice No. field, enter R-50000-001.

seg-source.mrk: In the Vendor Invoice No.
field, enter R-50000-001.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, select Item in the Type field.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, select Item in the Type field.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, enter R-50000-01.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field, enter R-50000-01.

trans-unit.source: In the Quantity field, enter 5.

seg-source.mrk: In the Quantity field, enter 5.

trans-unit.source: In the Direct Unit Cost field, enter 3200.

seg-source.mrk: In the Direct Unit Cost field, enter 3200.

trans-unit.source: : Purchase Order page

seg-source.mrk: : Purchase Order page

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Actions > Create Customized SN.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Actions > Create Customized SN.

trans-unit.source: In the Customized SN field, type R-50000-01-00001.

seg-source.mrk: In the Customized SN field, type R-50000-01-00001.

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: With the Receive and Invoice option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Receive and Invoice option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source: Close the open pages.

seg-source.mrk: Close the open pages.

trans-unit.source: Review the Machine Type Item Information

seg-source.mrk: Review the Machine Type Item Information

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to review the updates to the Machine Type item:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to review the updates to the Machine Type item:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Machines > Types > Machine Types.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Machines > Types > Machine Types.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the line for number R-50000-01 and notice that there are now five units of this machine type item in inventory.

seg-source.mrk: Double-click the line for number R-50000-01 and notice that there are now five units of this machine type item in inventory.

trans-unit.source: : Machine Type Card page showing on-hand inventory

seg-source.mrk: : Machine Type Card page showing on-hand inventory

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Machine Type Card page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Machine Type Card page.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, under Machines, click Machines > Machines.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, under Machines, click Machines > Machines.

trans-unit.source: Go to the end of the list and notice that five new Machine records for the MIG Welder exist and contain the created Serial Nos.

seg-source.mrk: Go to the end of the list and notice that five new Machine records for the MIG Welder exist and contain the created Serial Nos.

trans-unit.source: : Machines created for item R-50000-01

seg-source.mrk: : Machines created for item R-50000-01

trans-unit.source: Double-click the line for the first MIG Welder.

seg-source.mrk: Double-click the line for the first MIG Welder.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Customer FastTab and notice that the Machine Card is related to the Internal Customer after purchase.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Customer FastTab and notice that the Machine Card is related to the Internal Customer after purchase.

trans-unit.source: : Machine Card showing relation to the Internal Customer

seg-source.mrk: : Machine Card showing relation to the Internal Customer

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: When a Machine Type Item is sold, the customer on the Rent Order or Sales Order is transferred to the Customer No. field on the Service Item/Machine Card.

seg-source.mrk: When a Machine Type Item is sold, the customer on the Rent Order or Sales Order is transferred to the Customer No.
field on the Service Item/Machine Card.

trans-unit.source: Close the open pages.

seg-source.mrk: Close the open pages.
